as.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwrite by asChild
as.description_zh: 此组件应呈现为的元素或组件。可以被 asChild 覆盖

name.description: The name of the form field

:rules.description: Validation rules for the form field

validateOnMount.description: Whether to validate the field on mount
validateOnMount.description_zh: 是否在挂载时验证字段

validateOnBlur.description: Whether to validate the field on blur
validateOnBlur.description_zh: 是否在失去焦点时验证字段

validateOnChange.description: Whether to validate the field on change
validateOnChange.description_zh: 是否在更改时验证字段

validateOnInput.description: Whether to validate the field on input
validateOnInput.description_zh: 是否在输入时验证字段

validateOnModelUpdate.description: Whether to validate the field on model update
validateOnModelUpdate.description_zh: 是否在模型更新时验证字段

bails.description: Whether to stop validation on the first error
bails.description_zh: 是否在第一个错误时停止验证

label.description: The label for the form field

uncheckedValue.description: The value when the field is unchecked

modelValue.description: The model value of the form field

onUpdate:modelValue.description: Event handler for model value updates
onUpdate:modelValue.description_zh: 模型值更新的事件处理程序

keepValue.description: Whether to keep the value when the field is removed
keepValue.description_zh: 字段被移除时是否保留值
